meanings.definition: Not prepared or equipped for a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: She was the unreadiest person in the group when it came to solving puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The team was caught off guard and found themselves in the unreadiest state during the unexpected power outage.
meanings.sent3: Despite being the unreadiest, he managed to impress everyone with his quick thinking.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the unreadiest toolbox, lacking the necessary tools to handle the complex problem.
meanings.sent5: The unreadiest student in the class struggled to keep up with the advanced math concepts.
